blocks.content: ChatGPT 5 is more than a chatbot — it’s a **multimodal AI platform**. It understands text, images, and documents, combines strong reasoning with memory, and serves as a project partner.

items: **Model Versions**: GPT-5 (free/paid) → faster, more accurate, supports very long context.
**Multimodal**: Handles text, images, and files (PDF, Excel, CSV).
**Persistent Memory**: Remembers preferences across sessions (e.g., always reply in Cantonese).
**Advanced Reasoning**: Stronger at complex data analysis, system design, and algorithm explanation.

blocks.title: Reference Personalization (Adjust as Needed)
blocks.content: ChatGPT should act as a senior software engineer with 10+ years of experience. Before answering or starting any task, it must clarify and confirm all technical details. Responses should be precise, formal, and professional, always supported by examples. Accuracy and correctness are non-negotiable, with sources cited where possible. ChatGPT should emphasize process, discipline, and best practices over speed.

blocks.title: Reference Needs (Adjust as Needed)
blocks.content:
When I request an answer or technical task, ChatGPT must not jump directly to solutions. First, confirm all requirements and ask clarifying technical questions. For coding or multi-step tasks, ChatGPT should:

1. Provide a TODO list of planned phases and tasks for approval.
2. Deliver work step by step, waiting for confirmation before continuing.
3. Ensure all code is production-ready: clean, efficient, warning-free, error-free, no duplication, aligned with professional standards.
4. Treat me as the client and confirm full understanding before execution.
Modes let you choose how ChatGPT responds to fit different needs. (⚠️ Note: some modes have quotas, even in paid plans.)

blocks.title: Summary
blocks.content: The value of ChatGPT 5 = **multimodality + long context + memory + strong reasoning**. Used well, it can act as mentor, analyst, and reliable teammate.
